subject: Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Carolina Kostner edged the United States national champion Rachael Flatt, by 164.61 points to 161.04 points, to win the NHK Trophy in Nagoya, Japan.
snippet: Carolina Kostner edged the United States national champion Rachael Flatt, by 164.61 points to 161.04 points, to win the NHK Trophy in Nagoya, Japan.
